recommended_degree: Administrasi Bisnis, Manajemen Aset, Manajemen Bisnis, Manajemen Bisnis Industri Furnitur (Sarjana, Diploma)
job_description:
Support the purchasing process, including administration, quotation collection, and vendor follow-ups.

1. Assist in entering purchasing data into the system and ensuring document completeness.
2. Monitor PO status, delivery schedules, and provide updates to internal stakeholders.
3. Coordinate with vendors regarding pricing, product availability, and delivery timelines.
4. Do administrative activities such as filing documents and other correspondence
